p: Intra-host genomic variability also leads to antigenic variability, which is of higher importance, especially for pathogens that fail to elicit long-lasting immunity in their hosts, and remains a major contributor to the complexity of vaccine design [ 29, 30]. To date, there are no clinically approved vaccines available for protection of general population from SARS- and MERS-CoV infections as there is no effective vaccine to induce robust cell mediated and humoral immune responses [ 31, 32].
